name: 本·丹尼尔斯 Ben Daniels
intro: Ben Daniels (born 10 June 1964)[1] is an English actor. Initially a celebrated stage actor, Daniels was nominated for an Olivier Award for Best Supporting Actor for Never the Sinner (1991), the Evening Standard Award for Best Actor for 900 Oneonta (1994), Best Actor in the M.E.N. Theatre Awards for Martin Yesterday (1998), and won the 2001 Olivier Award for Best Supporting Actor for his performance in the Arthur Miller play All My Sons.
birthplace: 英国,英格兰,沃里克郡,纳尼顿
